summary.span: 表示在 控件中使用的文本框。

span.span: Represents a text box that is used in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了示例的控制在大型、 中型和小型变体中，并且任何映像。The following illustration shows examples of controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images. ![功能区文本框控件](~/add/media/wpfribbon-textbox.png "功能区文本框控件")![Ribbon text box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-textbox.png "Ribbon text box controls") 功能区文本框控件Ribbon text box controls ## Examples 下面的示例演示创建的标记具有较大的图像、 小图像和一个标签控件。The following example shows the markup to create a control with a large image, a small image, and a label. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonTextBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbontextbox)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 控件的键盘快捷键。

span.span: The keyboard shortcut for the control.

value.span: 已注册的默认值为 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Keytip 必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，不能包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时也称为访问密钥或加速器和用作激活控件的快捷组合键。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当应用程序代码或内部进程（如重新生成布局处理过程）调用 方法时，均会调用此方法。This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the method.

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 为 事件提供类处理，并在此控件获取键盘焦点时启用键盘焦点视觉。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event and enables the keyboard focus visual when this control gets keyboard focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写默认行为，此控件获取键盘焦点时启用键盘焦点视觉对象。This method overrides the default behavior and enables the keyboard focus visual when this control gets keyboard focus. 此实现不会更改处理的状态 (属性) 的事件数据。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写默认行为，此控件失去键盘焦点时禁用键盘焦点视觉对象。This method overrides the default behavior and disables the keyboard focus visual when this control loses keyboard focus. 此实现不会更改处理的状态 (属性) 的事件数据。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个包含指定的图像和标签与控件关联的大小和可见性信息的属性。A contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control. 此属性指定的图像和标签将显示此控件承载于快速访问工具栏中时。This property specifies how the image and label will appear when this control is hosted in the Quick Access Toolbar. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!WARNING] > 每个功能区控件继承属性。Each ribbon control inherits a property. 如果设置属性，则不会显示功能区的增强的工具提示; 将改为显示标准工具提示。If the property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 以下示例演示用于创建增强的工具提示的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the enhanced ToolTip. ![增强的工具提示](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "增强的工具提示")![Enhanced ToolTip](~/add/media/wpfribbon-tooltipenhanced.png "Enhanced ToolTip") 增强的工具提示功能Enhanced ToolTip [!code-xaml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonTextBoxTT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_controlssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbontextboxtt)]
